issue.title: Wrong argument type of I/O stream manipulators setprecision() and setw()

blockquote.pre: T5 setprecision(int n); T6 setw(int n);

discussion.p: The argument types should be streamsize, as in class ios_base (see ):
(Editorial: 'wide' should probably be renamed as 'width', or maybe just 'w'.)

blockquote.p: No concensus for this change. There was some interest in doing the opposite fix: Change the streamsize in <ios> to int. But ultimately there was no concensus for that change either.

li.p: In , header <iomanip> synopsis change as indicated:

blockquote.pre: T5 setprecision(intstreamsize n); T6 setw(intstreamsize n);
